name: sf-lifeline-server
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.dev: npx prisma migrate dev && fastify start -w -l info -P app.js
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec server sh -c 'cd server && npx prisma migrate $@' sh
scripts.db: docker-compose exec server sh -c 'cd server && npx prisma db $@' sh
